message.raw:
Convert `ign sdf` file inputs to absolute paths before processing them

Currently running `ign sdf -k model.sdf` results in an error because instead of processing the `model.sdf` file passed as a command line argument, it processes a `model.sdf` found in one of the search paths namely the model spec file located at `/usr/share/sdformat8/1.6/model.sdf`
